2.post_body: Has anyone noticed the strange activity in the plaza
I swear I heard whispering near the archives around midnight.
There's a black cat that keeps showing up in the courtyard. Anyone know who it belongs to?
Did someone spill something? The entire hallway reeks.
Saw glowing blue orbs near the tree line last night. Should we report this?
Trying to find a quieter area to prep for exams. Any recommendations?
Three brooms disappeared from the storage shed. Prank or theft?
Why did they remove pumpkin stew? I’m devastated.
Someone broke the dummy again. Who keeps overcharging their spells?
Snow revealed large tracks leading to the greenhouse. Not human.
Dropped my wand near the practice grounds. It's pine with a silver band. Please return!
Saw a figure at the top window last night but no one is assigned to that dorm.
We need volunteers for decorations and booth setup!
Okay… who mixed the wrong ingredients in cauldron #7??
Someone said there’s a hidden passage behind the west staircase. Anyone verify?
A restricted section book is gone. This is serious.
Heard strange chirping from the lake. Doesn’t match anything I know.
Why is my room freezing when the rest of the building is warm?
Anyone want to join a weekly spell theory study group?
The messenger owl keeps dropping letters randomly. Is it sick?
